name: Cuisine Hunt
description:
Hunt and collect materials to cook and serve customers to pay off your father's debt. Cuisine Hunt is an action platformer with mini games out in the open and creatures called "Foodimals" to be hunted for their ingredients. Cook and serve customers with a unique puzzle based cooking gameplay. If you manage to serve an amount of customers, you earn enough to pay off your father's debt and be released from the grasps of the "Ah Long".

Manage the restaurant alone

Cuisine Hunt is a 2D Side-Scroller action/puzzle game where you play as Xiu Long to work in Ah Long's restaurant alone. Hunt down the foodimals for their ingredients and bring it back to the restaurant to cook and serve to the hungry customers.

  • Hunt down foodimals for ingredients
  •  Solve the unique puzzle to cook the foods
  • Minigames to gather ingredients
